name: Chat Made With Java
short_description:
A chat Project that i started last year and decided to make it mroe serious this year of 2013.
The project is a JAR for the client, a JAR to host , a JAR to Register users and another JAR to Change Users Rights in Database.

The admin is able to ban users globally in database or just ban from the current chat. A moderator/Admin can ban users from a client JAR using /Kick name or  
/ban name , for example. 

There are still functions to make, like sending historic logs of the chat to your email, print the users online, etc. Its all preety simple, since the whole chat already works with a login Capability. 

To setup,for now,you will need to create the Database According to the Script and check the DataBases Classes / Dao Classes in Each JAR. 

I will be working on this but if you want to take the source code and improve it, feel free to. I did my best and i learned a lot with this.

Thanks
29/07/2013
summary: A Chat Project that contains A Client and Admin (Host) parts.
